Do I need to be Compiant

Yes!

Everyone needs to be accessible. This is nolonger an option but a requirement.

If you are a government agency or you receive assistance or funding from the federal government then you are to follow Section 508 requirments. Some comapanies may also require a VPAT Docuement to be followed as well.

But I am not a Goverment agency or receive funding?

When Section 508 doesnâ€™t apply, you're still required to be accessible under other laws, such as Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, or state or local laws.

With Section 508 alining with the WCGA guidelines for level AA, Kaffeinated Kodemonkey has stepped up our game to follow the same highest level of standards for all our clients.

In this free Brochure we will explain:

  • The Overall Benefits of being compliant and how it boosts your SEO
  • How to get a Free Accessibility Audit showing how compliant you currently are
  • What a VPAT document is and why would every website shoul have one
  • What Free Accessible Evaluation Tools you can use
  • How you can become compliat yourslef with some simple DIY know-how
